mapper.select: SELECT z.zone_no ,z.zone_name ,z.zone_info ,cit.comp_name ,z.pl_license_cnt, us.Pub_static ,z.tpl_license_cnt, us.Pub_dynamic,tm.allowed_cnt ,us.Pub_timelimit,tm.limited_period ,z.session_time , z.exist ,z.revision_no ,z.limited_url FROM zone_info_tbl z LEFT JOIN license_tmlimit_info_tbl tm ON z.zone_no =tm.zone_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tit.zone_no , IFNULL(SUM(CASE tit.license_type when '1' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS Pub_static, IFNULL(SUM(CASE tit.license_type when '2' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS Pub_dynamic, IFNULL(SUM(CASE tit.license_type when '3' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS Pub_timelimit FROM taa_info_tbl tit WHERE tit.allow_state = 1 GROUP BY zone_no ) us ON us.zone_no = z.zone_no LEFT JOIN comp_zone_list_tbl czlt ON z.zone_no = czlt.zone_no LEFT JOIN company_info_tbl cit ON czlt.comp_no = cit.comp_no GROUP BY z.zone_no ;

SELECT z.zone_no ,z.zone_name ,z.zone_info ,z.pl_license_cnt, us.Pub_static ,z.tpl_license_cnt, us.Pub_dynamic,tm.allowed_cnt ,us.Pub_timelimit,tm.limited_period ,z.session_time , z.exist ,z.revision_no ,z.limited_url FROM zone_info_tbl z LEFT JOIN license_tmlimit_info_tbl tm ON z.zone_no =tm.zone_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tit.zone_no , IFNULL(SUM(CASE tit.license_type when '1' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS Pub_static, IFNULL(SUM(CASE tit.license_type when '2' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS Pub_dynamic, IFNULL(SUM(CASE tit.license_type when '3' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS Pub_timelimit FROM taa_info_tbl tit WHERE tit.allow_state = 1 GROUP BY zone_no ) us ON us.zone_no = z.zone_no WHERE z.zone_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') ORDER BY ${column} ${ordering} LIMIT #{pageNum}, #{show_cnt}

SELECT zct.zone_no, zct.zone_name, zct.zone_info, zct.revision_no, zct.registed_date, zct.pl_license_cnt, zct.tpl_license_cnt, zct.session_time, zct.limited_url, zct.exist, zct.integrity_value FROM zone_info_tbl AS zct WHERE zct.exist = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM zone_info_tbl WHERE zone_name = #{zone_name}
SELECT zone_no FROM zone_info_tbl WHERE zone_name = #{zone_name}

SELECT z.zone_no , z.zone_name , z.zone_info , z.revision_no , z.registed_date , ziht.history_reg_date , z.pl_license_cnt , z.tpl_license_cnt , z.session_time ,z.exist ,z.limited_url FROM zone_info_tbl z LEFT JOIN zone_info_history_tbl ziht ON z.zone_no = ziht.zone_no WHERE z.zone_no = 34 ORDER BY history_reg_date DESC LIMIT 1 ;
SELECT allowed_cnt FROM license_tmlimit_info_tbl where zone_no =#{zone_no};
SELECT * FROM zone_info_tbl WHERE comp_no = #{comp_no}
SELECT * FROM zone_info_tbl WHERE exist = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE zone_info_tbl SET zone_name = #{zone_name}, zone_info = #{zone_info}, pl_license_cnt = #{pl_license_cnt}, tpl_license_cnt = #{tpl_license_cnt}, session_time = #{session_time}, revision_no = revision_no + 1, exist = #{exist} WHERE zone_no = #{zone_no}
mapper.select: SELECT lit.zone_no AS lit_zone_no, lit.taa_ip AS lit_taa_ip, lit.license_type AS lit_license_type, zct.zone_name AS zct_zone_name, zct.zone_info AS zct_zone_info, zct.revision_no AS zct_revision_no, zct.registed_date AS zct_registed_date, zct.pl_license_cnt AS zct_pl_license_cnt, zct.tpl_license_cnt AS zct_tpl_license_cnt, zct.session_time AS zct_session_time, zct.limited_url AS zct_limited_url, zct.exist AS zct_exist, zct.integrity_value AS zct_integrity_value FROM license_info_tbl AS lit JOIN zone_info_tbl AS zct WHERE (lit.zone_no = zct.zone_no) AND zct.exist = 'Y'

SELECT lit.zone_no AS lit_zone_no, lit.taa_ip AS lit_taa_ip, lit.license_type AS lit_license_type, zct.zone_name AS zct_zone_name, zct.zone_info AS zct_zone_info, zct.revision_no AS zct_revision_no, zct.registed_date AS zct_registed_date, zct.pl_license_cnt AS zct_pl_license_cnt, zct.tpl_license_cnt AS zct_tpl_license_cnt, zct.session_time AS zct_session_time, zct.limited_url AS zct_limited_url, zct.exist AS zct_exist, zct.integrity_value AS zct_integrity_value, lct.license_value FROM license_info_tbl AS lit JOIN zone_info_tbl AS zct JOIN license_code_tbl AS lct WHERE (lit.zone_no = zct.zone_no) AND lit.zone_no = #{zone_no} AND lit.taa_ip = #{taa_ip} AND lct.license_type = #{license_type} LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zone_info_tbl(zone_name, zone_info,revision_no, registed_date, pl_license_cnt, tpl_license_cnt, session_time, limited_url, exist, integrity_value) values (#{zone_name},#{zone_info}, #{revision_no}, now(),#{pl_license_cnt},#{tpl_license_cnt}, #{session_time},#{limited_url}, 'Y',#{integrity_value})
INSERT INTO license_info_tbl(zone_no, taa_ip, license_type) values (#{zone_no}, #{taa_ip}, #{license_type})

INSERT INTO license_tmlimit_info_tbl (zone_no , zone_name,allowed_ip , allowed_cnt , limited_period, icv) VALUES ((SELECT zone_no FROM zone_info_tbl WHERE zone_name=#{zone_name}), #{zone_name},#{allowed_ip},#{allowed_cnt} ,#{limited_period}, #{icv}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE zone_no =(SELECT zone_no FROM zone_info_tbl WHERE zone_name =#{zone_name}), zone_name = #{zone_name}, allowed_ip=#{allowed_ip}, allowed_cnt =#{allowed_cnt}, limited_period = #{limited_period}, icv= #{icv};

INSERT INTO zone_info_history_tbl(zone_no, zone_name,zone_info,revision_no, registed_date, pl_license_cnt,tpl_license_cnt,session_time, limited_url, exist, integrity_value,issuer_user_no,action, history_reg_date) values (#{zone_no},#{zone_name}, #{zone_info},#{revision_no},#{registed_date}, #{pl_license_cnt}, #{tpl_license_cnt},#{session_time}, #{limited_url}, #{exist}, #{integrity_value},#{issuer_user_no},#{action}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT ziht.zone_no,ziht.zone_name ,ziht.zone_info ,ziht.revision_no ,ziht.pl_license_cnt ,ziht.tpl_license_cnt ,ltit.allowed_cnt ,ziht.session_time ,ziht.limited_url ,ziht.integrity_value,uit.user_id AS issuer_user_id ,ziht.`action` , ziht.history_reg_date ,ziht.exist FROM zone_info_history_tbl ziht LEFT JOIN license_tmlimit_info_tbl ltit ON ziht.zone_no = ltit.zone_no JOIN user_info_tbl uit ON ziht.issuer_user_no = uit.user_no WHERE ziht.zone_no = #{zone_no};
SELECT * FROM license_code_tbl
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO license_info_history_tbl(zone_no, taa_ip,license_type,issuer_user_no, action, history_reg_date) values (#{zone_no}, #{taa_ip}, #{license_type}, #{issuer_user_no}, #{action}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM license_info_tbl WHERE zone_no = #{zone_no} and taa_ip = #{taa_ip} LIMIT 1

SELECT liht.license_history_no, liht.zone_no, liht.taa_ip, liht.license_type, liht.issuer_user_no, liht.`action`, liht.history_reg_date, uit.user_id AS issuer_user_id FROM license_info_history_tbl AS liht JOIN user_info_tbl AS uit ON liht.issuer_user_no = uit.user_no WHERE liht.zone_no = #{zone_no}
SELECT * FROM license_state_history_tbl AS lsht JOIN tam_info_tbl AS tit ON lsht.tam_no = tit.tam_no ORDER BY req_date DESC;

SELECT liht.license_history_no, liht.zone_no , zit.zone_name ,liht.taa_ip , liht.license_type , liht.issuer_user_no , liht.`action` , liht.history_reg_date, uit.user_id AS issuer_user_id FROM license_info_history_tbl liht LEFT JOIN zone_info_tbl zit ON zit.zone_no = liht.zone_no LEFT JOIN user_info_tbl uit ON uit.user_no = liht.issuer_user_no WHERE liht.license_history_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR zit.zone_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR liht.taa_ip LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR liht.history_reg_date LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') ORDER BY ${column} ${ordering} LIMIT #{pageNum}, #{show_cnt};

SELECT ltiht.history_no , ltiht.zone_no , zit.zone_name , ltiht.allowed_ip , ltiht.allowed_cnt ,ltiht.limited_period ,ltiht.issuer_user_no ,ltiht.`action` ,ltiht.history_reg_date FROM license_tmlimit_info_history_tbl ltiht LEFT JOIN zone_info_tbl zit ON ltiht.zone_no = zit.zone_no WHERE ltiht.history_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR zit.zone_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR ltiht.allowed_ip LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR ltiht.allowed_cnt LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR ltiht.limited_period LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR ltiht.issuer_user_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR ltiht.action LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR ltiht.history_reg_date LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') ORDER BY ${column} ${ordering} LIMIT #{pageNum}, #{show_cnt};

SELECT lsht.state_no , tit.tam_name , lsht.tam_local_ip, lsht.taa_no , lsht.taa_ip , lsht.taa_hostname , lsht.zone_name, lsht.license_type , lsht.req_type , lsht.req_date , lsht.req_result , lsht.result_reason FROM license_state_history_tbl lsht LEFT JOIN tam_info_tbl tit ON lsht.tam_no = tit.tam_no WHERE state_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR tit.tam_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR lsht.tam_local_ip LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR lsht.taa_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR lsht.taa_ip LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR taa_hostname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR lsht.zone_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR license_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR req_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR req_date LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR req_result LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR result_reason LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') ORDER BY ${column} ${ordering} LIMIT #{pageNum}, #{show_cnt};

SELECT lsht.state_no , tit.tam_name , lsht.tam_local_ip, lsht.taa_no , lsht.taa_ip , lsht.taa_hostname , lsht.zone_name, lsht.license_type , lsht.req_type , lsht.req_date , lsht.req_result , lsht.result_reason FROM license_state_history_tbl lsht LEFT JOIN tam_info_tbl tit ON lsht.tam_no = tit.tam_no ORDER BY ${column} ${ordering} LIMIT #{pageNum}, #{show_cnt};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zone_info_tbl WHERE zone_name = #{zone_name}
SELECT tam_name FROM tam_info_tbl;
SELECT taa_ip FROM license_info_tbl;
SELECT tam_local_ip FROM tam_info_tbl;
SELECT tam_local_port FROM tam_info_tbl;
SELECT pl_license_cnt, tpl_license_cnt FROM zone_info_tbl WHERE zone_no = #{zone_no};
SELECT COUNT(*) as pub_pl_cnt FROM taa_info_tbl tit where zone_no = #{zone_no} AND license_type =1;
SELECT taa_ip ,taa_hostname ,registed_date ,allow_state FROM taa_info_tbl tit where zone_no = #{zone_no} AND license_type =1;
SELECT taa_ip ,taa_hostname ,registed_date ,allow_state FROM taa_info_tbl tit where zone_no = #{zone_no} AND license_type =2;
SELECT taa_ip ,taa_hostname ,registed_date ,allow_state FROM taa_info_tbl tit where zone_no = #{zone_no} AND license_type =3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zone_info_tbl zit ;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM license_info_history_tbl liht LEFT JOIN zone_info_tbl zit ON liht.zone_no = zit.zone_no WHERE zit.zone_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR liht.taa_ip LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM license_state_history_tbl lsht

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM license_state_history_tbl lsht LEFT JOIN tam_info_tbl tit ON lsht.tam_no = tit.tam_no WHERE lsht.state_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR tit.tam_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR lsht.tam_local_ip LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR lsht.taa_ip LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR lsht.taa_hostname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR lsht.zone_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR lsht.license_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR lsht.req_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR lsht.req_date LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR lsht.req_result LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%') OR lsht.result_reason LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter},'%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM taa_info_tbl WHERE zone_no = #{zone_no} AND license_type=1 AND allow_state =1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM taa_info_tbl WHERE zone_no = #{zone_no} AND license_type =2 AND allow_state =1;
SELECT zone_no FROM zone_info_tbl zit WHERE zone_name =#{zone_name};
SELECT * FROM zone_info_tbl WHERE zone_no = #{zone_no};
